channel.title: Prayers messed
channel.description:
317 pi lost legacy
Ok so i have all the ancinet curses. When i activate them like lets say i have protect item on. i put soul split and it takes off protect item. and all the curses r pre much like that. ill post codes if i got to. PLEASE HELP!
also when i have 1 prayer i can click on the prayer and it shows its highlighted and i can click them all. How can i make it so u need the prayer or it wont be highlighted. PLEASE HELP!
